long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# AI-Powered Review Reply Generator for Booking.com Hosts  

Simplify and speed up your guest review replies with our intelligent Chrome plugin!  

Designed specifically for Booking.com hosts, this AI-powered tool seamlessly integrates with the platform to make responding to guest reviews effortless and professional.  

## What It Does  
- **Instant Response Generation**: Adds a convenient "Generate" button directly next to guest reviews.  
- **One-Click Replies**: Click the button to instantly generate a thoughtful, personalized response.  
- **Automatic Population**: The AI-crafted reply is automatically filled into the reply text area, saving you time and effort.  

## Why Install It?  
- **Save Time**: No more manual draftingâ€”generate replies in seconds.  
- **Consistency**: Ensure your responses are polite, professional, and aligned with your hosting standards.  
- **Enhance Guest Experience**: Quick and thoughtful replies can improve your ratings and guest satisfaction.  
- **Stay Focused**: Spend less time managing reviews and more time running your business.  

Take your hosting experience to the next level with this must-have AI tool. **Install now** and start replying to reviews faster and smarter!
